name: TAMPERER
description:
SUMMARY

Hide key evidence before the detective finds the body.

Oh God What Have I Done + A Murder Mystery Without Puzzles

CONTROLS

WASD to move

ADDED/CHANGED IN v2.0

  • Improved detective's behaviour so that he always arrives at the crime scene room last, to remove heavy RNG
  • Fixed a bug by which the detective could never find the body, even when standing on top of it
  • Made slight changes to the map layout to make it more believable if the detective walks past the corpse
  • Brought more variety in the evidence sprites
  • improved the walls tilemap to me seamless
  • Added as many storage spaces as there are pieces of evidence so that the game can be 'won'
  • Added a music bit before the detective arrives
